name: Super Drag Race
description:
Story:

In this drag race game your only mission is to upgrade your cars, drive quarter mile (402metres) drag races against AI opponents and earn money to upgrade car more faster and better. Player can select car from start of game. There is 5 different sport cars. Player can tuning car like buying better engine, tires, transmission etc. Also player can paint their car with different colors. Buying better parts make also ai opponent more harder. Can you be the king of streets and drive under 5 seconds times.

Features:

- Steam achievements
- 3 different drag races area
- Garage where can modify, tune and paint your cars
- 5 different cars to select
- Earn money at races and upgrade car better
